items.summary: Update the global website color palette to be inspired by traditional Chaniya Choli colors (e.g., rich bridal tones such as deep red/maroon with complementary warm-gold/neutral accents), and apply the updated palette consistently across the entire site (backgrounds, cards, borders, accents, buttons, link/active states) using the existing CSS variable theme system.

Remove colored text styling from all photo/placeholder areas across the site so that any text shown inside photo placeholders stays neutral (foreground/muted) and does not switch to an accent/primary color on hover or interaction.
